subject: Information about SIMSONN PC USB 7+R H Simulator Gear Shifter
description_text:
Hi ,
Is it possible to use the SIMSONN PC USB 7+R H Simulator Gear Shifter with the thrustmaster t818 ?
Thank you 
Edoardo Strazzera.

conversations.body_text: Hi Edoardo Strazzera,  If it’s a PC game, our pedals are compatible with any other brand’s wheel base, as they all work via USB connection to the PC, ensuring full compatibility.

So i can also use the gear shifter if it’s on a pc game , i have a thrustmaster t818?

>
